text: Answer: (a) and (d) Solution: Relationship is one to many (A to B) and there is total participation of A. A B - [} 2 ] . (a) True. R connects each entity in A to at least one entity in B because total participation of A is given. (b) False.Because of relation is one to many for A to B, therefore, each entity of A can make relationship with many entities of B and each entity of B can make relationship with only one entity of A. (c) False.Because there is partial participation of B. (d) True.Since relationship is one to many R each entity in B to at most one entity in A.
